techmeme.title: PhonePe and Google Pay accounted for over 85% share of 14.4B UPI transactions in July; PhonePe led with 5.9B transactions, Google Pay 5.3B, and Paytm 1.1B (Digbijay Mishra/The Economic Times)
Cisco Talos: eight vulnerabilities in Microsoft's macOS apps could be abused by attackers to record video/sound from a user's device, log user input, and more (Connor Jones/The Register)
Ex-Autonomy CEO Mike Lynch, who was acquitted on US fraud charges in June, is among six missing after a yacht sank off Sicily, according to Italian authorities (Associated Press)
Donald Trump shared AI-generated images on Truth Social that show Taylor Swift and her fans vowing their support for his campaign; Swift hasn't endorsed Trump (Nick Robins-Early/The Guardian)
The FBI, ODNI, and CISA say they are "confident" that Iran was responsible for recent attempted hacks into the Trump and Biden-Harris campaigns (Perry Stein/Washington Post)
